Episodes.Title: Turtle on Its Back
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Brad Bohannan
Episodes.Plot: For a bar to fail on Bourbon Street in New Orleans it takes a special kind of incompetence. Can bar expert Jon Taffer get these delusional owners to ditch their copy-cat ways and start thinking for themselves?

Episodes.Title: Rock N Roaches
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, Chloe Trueheart, Jessie Barnes
Episodes.Plot: Jon Taffer descends on a grotesque goth and rock bar in Austin, TX. Tasteless performances and cockroach infestations are the least of his problems as he spars with the worst bar owner to date.

Episodes.Title: Bros Got to Geaux!
Episodes.Actors: Darian Blanchard, Elayne Duff, Brian Duffy
Episodes.Plot: Jon Taffer comes to New Orleans tackles his first college bar run by the owners best friends.

Episodes.Title: Tears for Beers
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, Diamantina Casiano, P.J. King
Episodes.Plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer fights to save a terminally hip bar on 6th St in Austin, TX that is too cool for its own customers. If he fails it will not only cost a husband & wife their business but possibly their marriage.

Episodes.Title: Empty Pockets
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Mike Will Downey
Episodes.Plot: Jon travels to Denver, Colorado and attempts to help Avi, the owner of Zan Z Bar. With bartenders who over-pour, a cook who never changes gloves, and drunk patrons who still get served, its no surprise that Avi is losing $3,000 a ...

Episodes.Title: In a Pinch
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, Russell Davis, Sean Duggan
Episodes.Plot: Lona's Wardlow Station has locals upset over a controversial lobster tank game. Can Bar Expert Jon Taffer bring peace to this blue-collar community?

Episodes.Title: Karaoke Katastrophe
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, Chris Cyronek, Brian Duffy
Episodes.Plot: At Dimples, America's first karaoke bar, Jon Taffer must deal with dated dÃ©cor, an angry chef, and an oblivious owner... who's also a hoarder.

Episodes.Title: A Horse Walks Into a Bar
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, J.B. Brown, Aleah Chilleen
Episodes.Plot: Jon has to turn around a bar in a small Arizona town whose owners are drunk most of the time, the food is terrible, customers are out of control and the bank is about to foreclose because the owners are behind on their $180,000 mo...

Episodes.Title: Meat Sauna
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, Franky Marshall, Gianluca Rizza
Episodes.Plot: Bad ventilation cause hot, moist burger smoke to fill Scottsdale's least funny comedy club. Jon Taffer arrives to clear the air and use proven bar techniques to create bigger laughs and bigger profits for the troubled owners.

Episodes.Title: Don't Mess with Taffer's Wife
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Nicole Taffer
Episodes.Plot: An aggressive Las Vegas bar owner tries to pick up Nicole Taffer, sending Jon into a rage. Can he set this owner's wandering eyes straight and save a once famous blues bar without coming to blows first?

Episodes.Title: Play. Some. Janet. Jackson!
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King
Episodes.Plot: Las Vegas' first gay nightclub, Gipsy, is months from closing its doors thanks to its verbally abusive and over intoxicated owner. Can Jon rescue one of Sin City's most famous landmarks?

Episodes.Title: Beer and Loathing in Las Vegas
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King
Episodes.Plot: Hammers is a watering hole for blue-collar locals, owned and operated by two classically trained chefs and former friends. Taffer arrives to discover that both their business and their friendship appear beyond repair.

Episodes.Title: There's No Crying in the Bar Business
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Russell Davis
Episodes.Plot: Jon heads to a Georgia sports bar and encounters an owner whose incessant crying seems to prevent her noticing the massive employee theft issue occurring right under her nose.

Episodes.Title: Characters Assassination
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Russell Davis
Episodes.Plot: Charters Quarters might be the worst bar concept ever, but it's only 1 of the problems Jon must overcome at this confused establishment run by a family of Yankees in heart of Dixie.

Episodes.Title: Don't Judge a Booze by Its Bottle
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, Angela Marie Williams, Jessie Barnes
Episodes.Plot: North Carolina's Cashmere Nightclub has a bad name, poor decor, and an embarrassing manager, but when Jon learns that they are refilling premium liquor bottles with cheap booze, all hell breaks loose.

Episodes.Title: Corking the Bunghole
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Peter O'Connor
Episodes.Plot: 13 miles from Fort Bragg, Cliques suffers from a juvenile name and a repugnant reputation. Jon puts the owners through his personal bar boot camp in the hopes of making it the R&R choice destination for local military personnel.

Episodes.Title: Bar Full of Bull
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Tony Gemignani
Episodes.Plot: A rickety mechanical bull fails to attract customers in this salty New England whaling community. Can Jon right this ship and prevent two siblings from sinking the bar and their father's retirement?

Episodes.Title: Two Flew Over the Handlebars
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, John Carbo
Episodes.Plot: Two buxom sisters have driven their biker bar in Pawcatuck, Connecticut into a ditch. Can Jon get these party women to stop binge drinking and focus on the real assets of their bar?

Episodes.Title: Barely Above Water
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Russell Davis
Episodes.Plot: Taffer makes two bars out of one in an attempt to save both a beachfront bar in Warwick, Rhode Island, and the owner's marriage.

Episodes.Title: Crappy Cantina
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Russell Davis
Episodes.Plot: Two brothers have drained their parents' retirement fund by opening an ill-conceived death-metal concert bar. Taffer arrives to run off the metal-head clientele & straighten out this festering mosh pit of failure.

Episodes.Title: Drunk & Dirty Dolls
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Mia Mastroianni
Episodes.Plot: This Vegas motorsports bar has come off the track thanks to an inept owner & a staff of busty cougars. Can Jon create a new & classy concept to tap into the largest single & divorced MILF population in the country?

Episodes.Title: Empty Bottles Full Cans
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Russell Davis
Episodes.Plot: Customers bringing in their own booze and bartenders flashing their boobs aren't Jon's biggest problems with this Tennessee watering hole. Taffer must ignite a lazy owner's ingenuity to save the bar from going bust.

Episodes.Title: Hostile Takeover
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King
Episodes.Plot: A heavy drinking owner of an Irish sports bar is the subject of a hostile takeover...by his co-owners!

Episodes.Title: Taxed Out in Texas
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Russell Davis
Episodes.Plot: Torn apart by a dysfunctional staff and a bad reputation, a tax accountant turned bar owner struggles to keep his biker bar afloat.

Episodes.Title: Muscle Madness
Episodes.Actors: Jon Taffer, P.J. King, Vic Moea
Episodes.Plot: Two muscle-bound meatheads can't see pec-to-pec on how to run their Houston bar. Now, their tempers and testosterone threaten to tear their friendship apart.
